lendActionHelpText.descriptionText: Not all loans are eligible for promotions. Unfortunately, funds from this promotion can only be applied to certain loans. You can still support this loan using your own funds by clicking "Lend $25", or you can find an eligible loan here.

lendActionHelpText.descriptionTitle: Why can't I make this loan with my Free Trial?
lendActionHelpText.descriptionText: Free Trials cannot be used to make loans during their private fundraising period on Kiva. If you'd like to make a free loan, please select a different loan to support.

lendActionHelpText.descriptionTitle: Why can't I use my bonus to make this loan?
lendActionHelpText.descriptionText: Bonus funds cannot be applied to loans with repayment terms over 21 months or with a Field Partner Risk rating below 3 stars. To learn more, please follow this link.
